property.name: Text
property.value: Your Decepticon Shockwave, Cybertron Commander has +4 HP.

property.name: Text
property.value: Before the game begins -> You may reveal a Matrix of Leadership from your deck and put it into your hand. Up to three copies of Matrix of Leadership can fit into the utility slot of your Rodimus Prime, Worthy Leader.

property.name: Text
property.value: Your Raider Spinister, Infantry - Aerial Assault has +3 HP. Once per game, at the start of your turn -> You may put a Battle Master upgrade from your KO area onto your Raider Spinister, Infantry - Aerial Assault. If you do, flip this.

property.name: Text
property.value: Your Galvatron, Maniacal Tyrant has +3 HP. While your Galvatron, Maniacal Tyrant is in bot mode, he has +3 ATK and 'When this attacks -> do 2 damage to one of your characters.

property.name: Text
property.value: Your Sergeant Crosshairs, Artillery - Weapons Supervisor has +3 HP. Once per game, at the start of your turn -> You may put a Battle Master upgrade from your KO area onto your Sergeant Crosshairs, Artillery - Weapons Supervisor. If you do, flip this.

property.name: Text
property.value: Your Ironhide, Veteran Autobot has +4 HP. When your Ironhide, Veteran Autobot battles a Decepticon -> Ironhide gets Bold 2 and Tough 2 until end of battle.

property.name: Text
property.value: While your Bombshell, Decepticon Psy Ops is defending against an attacker that has Pierce -> Reduce the attacker's Pierce total based on the number of cards in your hand: 1-4 -> Reduce the attacker's Pierce total by 2. 5-7 -> Reduce the attacker's Pierce total by 3. 8+ -> Reduce the attacker's Pierce total by 4.

property.name: Text
property.value: Replace the text 'an enemy that doesn't have Pierce' on your Autobot Jazz, Special Ops with 'an enemy that has 8 Stars or fewer.'

property.name: Text
property.value: Your Bluestreak, Reluctant Solider has +3 HP. When your Bluestreak, Reluctant Soldier defends in bot mode and you flip at least [W][O][U] -> The attacker's base ATK becomes 0 during this battle.

property.name: Text
property.value: Your Inferno, Fearless Firefighter has +5 HP. When you flip your Inferno, Fearless Firefighter to bot mode -> Repair 1 damage from one of your Autobots.

card.name: I Don't Break Rules, I Just Bend Them - A Lot

property.name: Text
property.value: Once per game, when your Sideswipe, Reckless Warrior is on the battlefield and you flip him to another mode -> You may play up to two Upgrades from your KO area. If you play a card this way, flip this.

property.name: Text
property.value: Your Optimus Prime, Battlefield Legend has +3 HP.

property.name: Text
property.value: Your Ruckus, Combat Assault has +2 HP. When your Ruckus, Combat Assault is on the battlefield and you flip him to another mode -> Repair 1 damage from each of your Cars. One of your CArs gets Bold 1 until end of turn.

property.name: Text
property.value: Your Red Alert, Security Chief has 'When you flip to this mode -> You may scrap a card from your hand. If you do, repair 1 damage from each of your characters.

property.name: Text
property.value: For each card under your Sky-Byte, Harbinger of Doom -> He has +1 HP and +1 DEF up to +3 HP and +3 DEF.

property.name: Text
property.value: Your Firecons have +2 HP. Before the game begins -> You may reveal a Firecon Flame from your deck and put it into your hand.

property.name: Text
property.value: Your deck can have up to 2 extra Stars of [W] cards. Once per game, at the start of your turn -> You may deploy a character from under Trypticon, Assault Base to the battlefield, If you do, flip this.

property.name: Text
property.value: If your starting team has Onslaught and at least one other Combaticon -> Your Starscream, Scheming Second-in-Command has '[TAP], Discard a [K] Action from your hand -> Choose a Combaticon you own from outside the game and deploy it to the battlefield in alt mode with 2 damage on it.

property.name: Text
property.value: When your Megatron, Decepticon Leader is on the battlefield and you flip Hunker Down while battling -> After the battle you may swap a card from your hand for a Hunker Down you flipped this battle as though it had [G].

property.name: Text
property.value: At the start of your turn, if Wreck-Gar, Junkion Leader is in your KO area -> You may put up to 4 Upgrades from your scrap pile into your KO area. If you do, return Wreck-Gar to the battlefield tapped and repair 2 damage from him for each Upgrade put into the KO area this turn.

property.name: Text
property.value: Pierce 2. When you put this on a character that has 19 Stars or more -> Tap an enemy Decepticon that has 10 Stars or fewer.

property.name: Text
property.value: Choose one of your characters. When it attacks this turn, if it's a Plane, Helicopter, or Spaceship and is attacking a Truck, Car, or Tank -> The chosen character gets +4 ATK and Pierce 4 until end of battle.

property.name: Text
property.value: Play only if you had an Autobot and a Decepticon on your starting team. Until end of turn, each of your characters' base ATK is 6. At end of turn -> Do 2 damage to each of your characters that attacked this turn.

property.name: Text
property.value: Can't be put on Decepticons. When the upgraded character defends and you flip at least [B] -> Move 1 damage counter from the upgraded character to the attacker. When the upgraded character defends and you flip at least [O][U] -> Repair 1 damage from the upgraded character. Do 1 damage to the attacker.

property.name: Text
property.value: One of your Melee characters gets Bold 2 until end of turn. Move a damage counter from one of your Ranged characters to an enemy. Flip one of your Specialists to another mode.

property.name: Text
property.value: Choose one of your characters that's a Predacon or Beast. When it attacks an enemy in bot or body mode this turn -> The attacking character gets Bold 4 until end of battle.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reveal -> As your opponent plays an action with no battle icons. When Revealed -> Scrap that Action and it has no effect.

property.name: Text
property.value: The upgraded character has Stealth while untapped.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reveal -> If one or more damage counters would be moved from one character to another. When Revealed -> Damage counters can't be moved between characters this turn.

property.name: Text
property.value: If you have Bruticus on the battlefield -> He gets Pierce 2 until end of turn. If you have 5 Combaticons in bot mode on the battlefield and/or in your KO area -> Combine them into Bruticus, Unstoppable Giant.

property.name: Text
property.value: When the upgraded character attacks -> Do 1 damage to it. After battle, do 1 more damage to tht character unless you scrap an Upgrade from it.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reveal -> When one of your characters defends and you flip battle cards. When Revealed -> If your defender's DEF is greater than the attacker's ATK, do damage to the attacker equal to the difference.

property.name: Text
property.value: Up to 2 Crushing Claws can fit into 1 of Scorponok's Weapon slots. When the upgraded character attacks, if you have no other characters and flip at least [O][B][U] -> Do 1 damage to each enemy.

property.name: Text
property.value: Draw a card. One of your characters gets Bold 1 until end of turn.

property.name: Text
property.value: You may KO one of your characters that has 5 Stars or fewer. If you do, do 3 damage to an enemy and repair 3 damage from one of your other characters.

property.name: Text
property.value: Put on Scorponok only. Pierce 2. This can't be scrapped by your opponent's cards. While Scorponok has Crushing Claws and Zarak's Shield -> He gets an additional Pierce 5.

property.name: Text
property.value: Put on Melee characters only. When the upgraded character attacks and you flip at least [U][U] -> The defender's base DEF becomes 0 during this battle.

property.name: Text
property.value: Put only on Predacons or Beasts. When the upgraded character takes damage -> Put 1 rage coutner on this. The upgraded characters gets +1 ATK for each rage counter on this. At the end of your turn -> Remove all rage counters from this.

property.name: Text
property.value: Put on Dinobots only. Bold 3. Pierce 3.

property.name: Text
property.value: Can't be put on Decepticons. When you put this on a Gurdian or a character in Combiner mode -> Do 2 damage to each enemy.

card.name: Nothin's Gonna Stand In Our Way

property.name: Text
property.value: One of your characters gets Pierce 1 until end of turn. If this is the third Notin's Gonna Stand In Our Way you've played this turn -> Untap one of your characters with 12 Stars or fewer. You may play another Nothin's Gonna Stand In Our Way.

property.name: Text
property.value: Put only on Motorcycles, Sentinels, or Stunticons. When you flip battle cards while the upgraded character defends -> Until end of battle, the upgraded character gets +DEF equal to half the number of different battle icons you flipped this battle, rounded up. Do that much damage to the attacker.

property.name: Text
property.value: Repair 5 damage from one of your characters that has 19 Stars or more. Then put this card into your KO area.

property.name: Text
property.value: Draw a card. Then draw a card for each Scan the Vaults in your scrap pile.

property.name: Text
property.value: After the upgraded character attacks -> Scrap this card. If the upgraded character is a Sharkticon, put this on one of your other Sharkticons instead.

property.name: Text
property.value: Choose up to 5 of your characters. If they share a treat, repair 1 damage from each of them.

property.name: Text
property.value: Put on Starscream only. This can be in an Armor slot. Increase each number in the upgraded character's text box by 1. This effect does not modify abilities granted by upgrades or other effects.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reveal -> When one of your characters defends against an enemy in bot or body mode. When Revealed -> The attacking player flips that attacker to alt mode.

property.name: Text
property.value: Pierce 2. When this is on Windblade -> She has Tough 1.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reveal -> After your opponent chooses an attacker and before they choose a defender. When Revealed -> KO one of your characters. Then untap one of your other characters.

property.name: Text
property.value: One of your Autobot Leaders gets Bold 4 until end of turn. If that character is upgraded with Matrix of Leadership -> Repair 3 damage from it.

property.name: Text
property.value: Choose an enemy character. Scrap a Utility from it, then do 1 damage to it.

property.name: Text
property.value: When you play this from hand -> You may play a Trithyllium Plating from your scrap pile. Up to 3 Trithyllium Platings can fit in 1 Armor slot. While the upgraded character is defending against an enemy that has Pierce -> Reduce that enemy's Pierce total by 2.

property.name: Text
property.value: Can't be put on Autobots. The upgraded character has Bold 1 for each card under it, up to Bold 4.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reveal -> When one of your characters defends. When Revealed -> Reveal the top 5 cards of your opponent's deck. Put them back in any order.

property.name: Text
property.value: Put on Combaticons only. When the upgraded character defends and your opponent flips battle icons of at least 3 different colors -> Do 2 damage to an enemy.

property.name: Text
property.value: When the upgraded character attacks and does 4 or more attack damage -> Repair 2 damage from the upgraded character.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reveal -> If one of more battle cards would be put under a character. When Revealed -> Until end of turn, if one or more battle carsd would be put under a character, scrap those battle cards instead.

property.name: Text
property.value: While this is on Scorponok -> He gets +1 DEF. While this is on Zarak -> He can't take more than 3 attack damage from a single attack.

property.name: Text
property.value: Stealth. When you flip to this mode -> Reveal the top card of your opponent's deck. If it's an Action, you may play it.

property.name: Text
property.value: When this attacks an enemy Autobot -> This gets +2 ATK until end of turn.

property.name: Text
property.value: When this attacks a Tank or Truck -> This gets +2 ATK until end of turn.

property.name: Text
property.value: When you flip to this mode -> Do 2 damage to a Ranged enemy.

property.name: Text
property.value: Enemies can't use Brave or Stealth. When this attacks an enemy that has an Armor -> Do 1 damage to that enemy.

property.name: Text
property.value: When you flip to this mode -> Draw a card. If you have another Autobot on the battlefield, draw another card.

property.name: Text
property.value: When you flip to this mode -> Each of your Autobots gets Bold 1 until end of turn.

property.name: Text
property.value: When you flip to this mode -> You may scrap a [W] card from your hand. If you do, move 2 damage from this to an enemy.

property.name: Text
property.value: If one of your Leaders that has 10 Stars or more would take attack damage -> You may have this take that damage instead.

property.name: Text
property.value: When this attacks and you flip at least [O][B][U] -> DO 1 damage to EACH character, then do 1 damage to EACH Decepticon.

property.name: Text
property.value: Stealth. When you flip to this mode -> Your opponent scraps a card at random from their hand. You may return a card that shares a card type with the scrapped card from your scrap pile to hand.

property.name: Text
property.value: Each of your Autobots has Pierce 2. When you flip to this mode -> Look at your opponent's hand.

property.name: Text
property.value: When this is KO'd by the effect of Peace Through Tyranny -> Do 2 damage to an enemy Autobot.

property.name: Text
property.value: Bold 1. If another Weapon would be put into the same Upgrade slot as this -> Scrap that Weapon instead. If this would leave the battlefield while upgrading a Leader that has 10 Stars or more -> Instead deploy this to the battlefield in bot mode with 6 damage counters on him.

property.name: Text
property.value: Each of your other Combaticons has Bold 1 and Tough 1.

property.name: Text
property.value: When you flip to this mode -> Draw a card. When one of your Combaticon attacks -> Plan 1.

property.name: Text
property.value: Stealth. [TAP] Scrap a [W] card from your hand -> Each player chooses two cards from their hand and scraps the rest. Each player with fewer than 2 cards in hand draws cards equal to the difference.

property.name: Text
property.value: Once per turn, if your opponent would draw a card, except for the first card they draw at the start of their turn -> You draw a card instead.

property.name: Text
property.value: Stealth. When you flip to this mode -> Return a card at random from your scrap pile to hand.

property.name: Text
property.value: After you flip battle cards for this character's attack and before defense flips -> You may play a [B] Utility you flipped.

property.name: Text
property.value: Stealth. When you flip to this mode -> Your opponent chooses one of their Upgrades and scraps it.

property.name: Text
property.value: When this attacks, you may scrap a [U] card from your hand -> If you do, this gets +3 ATK until end of turn.

property.name: Text
property.value: Your starting Star limit increases by 1 for each Sweep on your starting team. Enemies can't use Brave of Stealth against this or your Sweeps.

property.name: Text
property.value: When you flip to this mode -> One of your Sweeps gets Pierce 2 until end of turn.

property.name: Text
property.value: When this battles an enemy in bot mode -> This gets +1 ATK and +1 DEF until end of battle.

property.name: Text
property.value: When this attacks -> Put the top 3 cards of your deck face down under this.

property.name: Text
property.value: When you flip to this mode -> Play a card from under this. Scrap that card at the end of turn.

property.name: Text
property.value: Horde 3. Stealth. This can't take non-attack damage from your opponent's cards.

property.name: Text
property.value: When you flip to this mode -> This can attack untapped enemies this turn as though they were tapped.

property.name: Text
property.value: Your starting Star limit is increased by 2 if Omega Supreme is on your starting team. This has Stealth while you have Omega Supreme on the battlefield.

property.name: Text
property.value: [TAP] Scrap a card from your hand -> Draw 2 cards, then put a card from your hand on top of your deck. If you have a character in combiner mode, instead draw 3 cards, then put a card from your hand on top of your deck.

property.name: Text
property.value: When you flip to this mode -> Return an Upgrade from your scrap pile to hand.

property.name: Text
property.value: When this attacks an Autobot -> You may play a Weapon. When this defends against a Decepticon -> You may play an Armor.

property.name: Text
property.value: When you flip to this mode -> Your opponent scraps a card from their hand.

property.name: Text
property.value: Bold 2, Tough 2, Pierce 2. When this attacks on the turn he's combined -> For each battle card you flip that has at least [K], do 1 damage to an enemy.
